notes.title: Meeting Agenda
notes.description:
Agenda for the weekly team meeting:
1. Review progress on ongoing projects.
2. Discuss upcoming deadlines.
3. Assign tasks for the week.
4. Any other business.

notes.title: Travel Itinerary
notes.description:
Itinerary for the upcoming trip:
- Destination: Paris, France
- Dates: April 20th - April 25th
- Accommodation: Hotel Le Bristol
- Day 1: Visit Eiffel Tower
- Day 2: Louvre Museum
- Day 3: Seine River Cruise
- Day 4: Montmartre and Sacré-Cœur Basilica

notes.title: Birthday Party Planning
notes.description:
Planning for Sarah's birthday party:
- Date: May 5th
- Venue: Sarah's backyard
- Theme: Hawaiian Luau
- Activities: Hula dancing, limbo contest, and beach volleyball
- Food: BBQ, tropical fruit salad, and pineapple upside-down cake

notes.title: Workout Routine
notes.description:
Weekly workout routine:
- Monday: Cardio (30 minutes)
- Tuesday: Upper body strength training
- Wednesday: Rest
- Thursday: Lower body strength training
- Friday: Yoga
- Saturday: HIIT workout
- Sunday: Rest

notes.title: Book Recommendations

3. '1984' by George Orwell
4. 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
